screen_desc: This screenshot shows the "Theme" settings on a smartphone. The user can select a theme from the "My themes" section or choose from various color options displayed below. The currently selected color is dark gray, indicated by a checkmark. There is also an option to show more color choices at the bottom. The navigation bar is visible at the bottom of the screen.
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
click on the "System" option located at the middle-lower part of the screen.
click on the "Languages & input" located at the upper left.
click on the "Virtual keyboard" settings located at the left and upper middle part of the screen.
click on the "Gboard Multilingual typing" option located at the upper left side of the screen.
click on the "Theme" located at upper middle and left.
action_plan: Select a different color from the available options to change the keyboard theme.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Select a color from the available options to change the keyboard theme.
